name: Luna Shadowwhisper
look: Haunted eyes, messy hair, worn clothes, thin build

moves.name: Telepathy
moves.description: You can read people's thoughts and project your own into their minds. Whenever you have time and physical contact, you can read someone's surface thoughts.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: When you cast a spell (with Use Magic), as well as the normal effects, you may pick from the following: Inflict 1-harm on the target, ignoring armour; The target contracts a disease; One of the target's limbs is crippled.

playbookSpecial.darkSideDescription: You are always on edge, expecting danger at every turn. You have trouble trusting others and may see threats where none exist.

notes: Recently had a vision of an impending supernatural disaster. Need to warn the team.
backstory: Discovered psychic abilities at a young age. Trained in secret by a coven of witches before striking out on my own to hunt monsters.
